InitialFeedbackHistory:
24/06/2022
1. Data: You don't have to mention your manuscripts in a DMP, documentation fits better under 4
2. Ethics: is the data that you are using fully anonymous? If not please fill the CTC GDPR questionnaire: www.uzleuven.be/nl/clinical-trial-center/ctc-gdpr-questionnaire; for more information see: https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/en/studpers/index
6. Sharing: Since you work with human data best to use European repositories (EBI instead of NCBI). For flow cytometry take a look if flow repository https://flowrepository.org/ is suitable and for microscopy IDR may be interesting (https://idr.openmicroscopy.org/). For data for which there is no suitable repository you can now also use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr).
label: good with suggestions
